com.nokia.maps.component.gesture

Class GestureLongTouch

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nokia.maps.component.AbstractMapComponent
      • com.nokia.maps.component.touch.TouchComponent
        • com.nokia.maps.component.gesture.LongTouchComponent
          • com.nokia.maps.component.gesture.GestureLongTouch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MapComponent

    public class GestureLongTouch
extends LongTouchComponent
    This class defines a MapComponent which responds to the LONG PRESS gesture from the Gesture API.
    See Also:
    TimerLongTouch

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String ID
      This constant defines a unique ID for the Long Touch Component.

      • Fields inherited from class com.nokia.maps.component.AbstractMapComponent

        map

      This method instantiates a new instance of a GestureLongTouch component with a Command to fire when a long press event has occurred.

      This method is called from the GestureListener when a Long Press has occurred.
      protected boolean onTouchEventEnd(int x, int y)
      The touch event does not react to Presses, only Long Presses, hence Touch events must not be consumed.

        public static final java.lang.String ID

        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • GestureLongTouch

        public GestureLongTouch(MapListener mapCanvas,
                javax.microedition.lcdui.CommandListener commandListener,
                javax.microedition.lcdui.Command command)
        This method instantiates a new instance of a GestureLongTouch component with a Command to fire when a long press event has occurred.
        Parameters:
        mapCanvas - the canvas to inform for commands
        commandListener - the command listener handling Commands from this MapComponent
        command - the Command to fire when a long press has occurred.

    • Method Detail

      • onTouchEventEnd

        protected boolean onTouchEventEnd(int x,
                      int y)
        The touch event does not react to Presses, only Long Presses, hence Touch events must not be consumed.
        Overrides:
        onTouchEventEnd in class TouchComponent
        Parameters:
        x - x axis pixel coordinate on the screen that has been touched.
        y - y axis pixel coordinate on the screen that has been touched.
        Returns:
        true if pointer event was consumed

      • onLongPressEvent

        protected boolean onLongPressEvent(int x,
                       int y)
        This method is called from the GestureListener when a Long Press has occurred. Subclasses should implement longPressAt() to run any code associated with them.

        Note the MapComponent must be placed on a GestureMapCanvas to respond to the lonngPress() event.

        Overrides:
        onLongPressEvent in class TouchComponent
        Parameters:
        x - x axis pixel coordinate on the screen that has been long pressed.
        y - y axis pixel coordinate on the screen that has been long pressed.
        Returns:
        true since the event is always consumed by this MapComponent

      • onDragEvent

        protected boolean onDragEvent(int x,
                  int y)
        This method is called when a drag event occurs.
        Overrides:
        onDragEvent in class TouchComponent
        Parameters:
        x - x axis pixel coordinate on the screen that has been touched.
        y - y axis pixel coordinate on the screen that has been touched.
        Returns:
        false since the event is never consumed by this MapComponent
